data.name: The Lost Legends of Redwall™ : The Scout, Act I : Soundtrack
data.detailed_description:
The epic music of The Lost Legends of Redwall : The Scout is now available in this official soundtrack.

This Soundtrack includes all 16 original tunes from the game, plus 6 bonus tracks, in both .MP3 and .WAV format, plus a smackerel of digital morsels to make a good beast beam with joy:

Extras:

  • A baker's dozen of 4k Desktop wallpapers
  • A framable lyric sheet of the title track, My Home, My Holt
  • A voice over blooper reel from the fantastic Lost Legends Players

Tracks:

  • Martin's Jig by James Marantette
  • Scurrying About by Keith Medley
  • Breaking Bread by Keith Medley
  • Hotroot Sunsalad by James Marantette
  • Warmed Hayberry Cordial by James Marantette
  • Dandelion and Burdock by James Marantette
  • Festive by Keith Medley
  • Joyful Hope by Keith Medley
  • Quince Pie, Oh My! by James Marantette
  • The Approach by James Marantette
  • I Smell Sauerkraut by James Marantette
  • Oh Rats! by James Marantette
  • A Vile Slobber by James Marantette
  • The Chase by James Marantette
  • Cutscene Medley by James Marantette
  • My Home, My Holt, Music by Keith Medley and James Marantette, vocals by Bill Russell
  • Gatehouse by Seth Stanley
  • Snowglobe by Seth Stanley
  • Sea Rats by Keith Medley
  • Fear and Courage by Keith Medley
  • Sandals in the Abbey by Keith Medley
  • Media Vita by The Veritas Choir and Sally Mehler

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7 +
  • Processor: I3 or above
  • Memory: 512 MB RAM
  • Graphics: N/A
  • Storage: 300 MB available space

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: 10.0 +
  • Processor: i5 or above
  • Memory: 512 MB RAM
  • Graphics: N/A
  • Storage: 300 MB available space
